recipe.title: Spicy Horseradish Sauce
ingredients: 1 tablespoon extra-hot prepared white horseradish (such as Atomic) or regular prepared horseradish
instructions: Whisk all ingredients in medium bowl. DO AHEAD: Can be made 2 days ahead. Cover tightly; chill. Rewhisk before using.

MORE INFO: Atomic brand horseradish sauce is available at some supermarkets and from cosmicchile.com. A word to the wise: Don't smell the horseradish to confirm that it's extra-hot (as we did). Take our word for it.
